## Overview

Short description of the feature. Including links to supporting ADR documents.

## Tasks

- [ ] Outline documentation approved
- [ ] Create an ADR if applicable 
- [ ] docs.nats.io updated
- [ ] Supporting blog posts or videos for marketing
